data.title: South Ayrshire 4 Community
data.text:
Your data

Under the new General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) you are required to consent to your data (all your personal registration details are listed above) being stored and used to provide you with South Ayrshire 4 Community services.

Idox Software Limited will only use this data for the purposes of:

Sending you an email with details on how to change your password if you have forgotten it

Sending you an email with news updates regarding funding

Sending you an email time to time requesting feedback about the service

Notifying you of any changes in the status of tracked schemes, saved searches or saved items that you enable within your account

To provide personal information and site usage to South Ayrshire Council

You have the right to withdraw your consent at any time. You can do this by deleting your profile in your account.
